participant_1.background:
My parents are very supportive of my interests, even if they don't always understand them.
I'd rather read my horoscope and write my own poems, thank you very much.
I don't mind my family, but we don't have a lot in common.
I like to go to museums on the weekend to learn new things and experience different cultures.
I am proud of my long curly hair, and the fact that I own a home.

participant_2.background:
My DM was late to the game so we played a round of cards while we waited.
I brush my teeth and get ready for work while my kids get dressed for school.
Music calms my soul.
i speak french and english fluently.
i work at a candy store.

content.text: Pretty good! Just got home from work. You?
I'm doing well! Just got home from the museum. I love going there to learn about different cultures.
That sounds like fun! I love learning new things too. I speak English and French fluently, but I've always wanted to learn another language.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn French. I'm not very good at languages, but I think it would be really cool to be able to speak multiple languages.
It's definitely a challenge, but it's so worth it! Being able to communicate with people from all over the world is a really amazing feeling.
I bet! I'm sure it's also really helpful in your job.
It is! I work at a candy store, and we get a lot of tourists from all over the world. It's really nice to be able to speak to them in their own language.
That's awesome! I'm sure they appreciate it too.
Yeah, I think they do. It's always nice to be able to communicate with people, even if it's just a simple conversation about candy.
I agree! I love talking to people from different cultures. It's so interesting to learn about their lives.
Me too! It's one of the best things about traveling.
I'm glad you think so! I've always wanted to travel the world, but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely go! It's an amazing experience.
I know, I know! I'm hoping to go someday soon.
I hope you do! It'll be worth it.
